articles.title: ‘Never allow someone to pay your bill’: Commentary great Harsha Bhogle’s warning to Indian stars - Fox Sports
articles.description: Legendary Indian commentator Harsha Bhogle believes the five cricketers who are under investigation for breaking biosecurity protocols will be cleared to play at the SCG.
articles.content:
In an expansive interview on Fox Crickets Follow-On podcast, Bhogle did not dismiss the nature of the quintets alleged offence, but stopped short of advocating a suspension.

articles.title: Brisbane Heat beat Sydney Thunder by five wickets at the Gabba, thanks to fifties for Joe Burns and Joe Denly - ABC News
articles.description: He may not have a spot in the Test side, but Joe Burns shows some Big Bash form with a crucial 50 in the Brisbane Heat's win over Sydney Thunder.
articles.content: Axed Test opener Joe Burns released the shackles with a match-winning innings for the Brisbane Heat as they kept in touch with the BBL's top five and snapped the Sydney Thunder's five-game winning st… [+2998 chars]
